document_data.name: Dran
document_data.mainbody: '''Dran''' was a treasure hunter in the [[Moonwood]].
document_data.History: In [[1484 DR]], Dran, his twin [[Garn (Dran's brother)|Garn]], and [[Lisstra]] followed [[Karrik]] to explore the ruins of [[Methegrist]].
document_data.Relationship: Dran was the twin brother of Garn. Like his twin, Dran was totally loyal to Karrik.
document_data.Personality: Dran was the exuberant one of the twins, always offering idiotic ideas or mistaken information.
